prs.title: docs: fix build instructions for op-node and op-proposer
prs.truncated_body:
**Description**

[This PR](https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/optimism/pull/13042) broke the README.md related to [`op-node`](https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/optimism/blob/develop/op-node/README.md) and [`op-proposer`](https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/optimism/blob/develop/op-proposer/README.md) as it now uses `just` instead of `make`. This PR fixes this.

I consider this more than

commits.message: docs: fix build instructions for op-node and op-proposer

prs.title: feat: add indicative price
prs.truncated_body:
This PR enables ER to provide indicative prices when the `user_wallet_address` is not specified. It does this in a somewhat hacky way, reusing the `get_quote` api for ease.

prs.title: Show unsupported warning for DNS Import when name has emojis
prs.truncated_body:
* Added a flag that checks if the name matches the decoded uri of the name.
* useBasicName returns a name value which runs decodeURI on the inputted name.
* If the flag is true, then set the view to ImportError.

commits.message: add flag to check if name and decodeURI name match

prs.title: feat: add next nullifier index
prs.truncated_body:
Issue:
- when indexing the nullifier event it was difficult to remove the correct leaves from the nullifier queue

Changes:
- add `nullifier_next_index` to simplify removing values from the input queue by using it as a continuous index
- this changes the BatchedMerkleTreeStruct -> regenerated accounts
